executive_brief: Initial seed dataset for the AI Council dashboard. Replace via GitHub Action output. Focus on premium UX, measurable growth levers, and risk-aware execution.

opportunities.title: Partner bundles with pro creators
opportunities.why_now: High creator tool churn; bundle reduces switching friction and improves ARPU
proofs: Comparable bundle uplift at peer platforms

opportunities.title: LuxGrid UI showcase microsite
opportunities.why_now: Demand for premium UI kits; showcase drives brand search and qualified leads
proofs: Portfolio sites correlate with inbound spikes

optimizations.action: Add 90-second guided tour with role presets
Refine hero to emphasize reliability + luxury craft

content_calendar.title: Designing for Quiet Luxury in UI

twitter_threads.hook: Quiet luxury in product design wins trust.
twitter_threads.cta: See how LuxGrid implements this standard.

risks.name: AI vendor instability
risks.mitigation: Abstract via provider-agnostic client + canary tests

top_5_actions.why: Boost activation and reduce support load
